newsitem.title: UK: Brent cargo trades unchanged at July -70 cts.
newsitem.headline: Brent cargo trades unchanged at July -70 cts.

text.p: A cargo of international benchmark Brent blend crude changed hands on Wednesday at July Brent -70 cents, unchanged from Tuesday's values, traders said.
The cargo loading June 17-19 was one of a flurry of physical North Sea crude cargoes traded on Wednesday afternoon. A Brent loading June 17-19 changed hands at July Brent -70 cents on Tuesday
Other trades on Wednesday included a Draugen loading June 25-27 sold at Dated +10 cents and an Ekofisk loading June 27-29 sold at Dated -1 cent.
About five Statfjords were moved on Wednesday and while the values were not immediately disclosed traders said they appeared to be in the range of Dated Brent -5 cents/+5 cents.
